ThingDef.label: kwazaari bodysuit
ThingDef.description: A full kwazaari bodysuit made of kwazaari alloy crystalline fiber. It is light and thin, but surprisingly sturdy.

ThingDef.label: kwazaari modular security armor
ThingDef.description: The kwazaari configuration of the Greydale modular body protection system, the "Warrior III" security armor provides modest protection for most body parts. If you have the proper equipment, It can be reassembled into other armor.

ThingDef.label: kwazaari security helmet
ThingDef.description: A kwazaari helmet of the "Warrior III" kwazaari security armor. A simple and robust protection gear.

ThingDef.label: kwazaari modular pioneer armor
ThingDef.description: A kwazaari armor designed primarily for combat engineer, Greydale "Laconian III" pioneer armor has integrated tool set. It's a pretty good gear for builds something while gunfight.

ThingDef.label: kwazaari pioneer helmet
ThingDef.description: A helmet of the "Laconian III" pioneer armor. A simple pain damper system integrated.

ThingDef.label: kwazaari modular nomad armor
ThingDef.description: "Akicita III", the long-range kwazaari scout variant of the kwazaari "Warrior III" modular body protection system. This outfit recycles the wearer's body waste and moisture, provides heat and cold protection and sound dampening, and assists the wearer with servo motors and a lightweight exoskeleton. The wearer needs less sleep, moves faster, hunting quieter. Originally designed as a protective device for explorers, guerrillas and caravans of rimworlds soon realized the amazing potential of the equipment.

ThingDef.label: kwazaari nomad helmet
ThingDef.description: A kwazaari helmet of the "Akicita III" kwazaari nomad armor. Its long-range observation equipment can also be used for aiming.

ThingDef.label: kwazaari modular Medic armor
ThingDef.description: Designed for combat medics, the "Hospitaller III" kwazaari armor is the medical variant of the "Warrior III" kwazaari modular body protection system. The armor is equipped with a variety of medical tools and supplies, so the wearer can treat the injured in the field.

ThingDef.label: kwazaari medic helmet
ThingDef.description: A kwazaari helmet of the "Hospitaller III" kwazaari Medic armor. The built-in AI medical interface assists the wearer during medical procedures.

ThingDef.label: kwazaari drop suit
ThingDef.description: Yeonhwa Precision Quasar Drop Suit model 412f, 'JanYeong(shadow remains) III'. Built for the YeonHwa Aggresive Marketing Division's drop troops, this completely enclosed suit is designed to perform low orbit jump action. Its integrated long-ranged jump pack makes JanYeong ideal equipment for the rapid insertion mission.

ThingDef.label: kwazaari dropsuit helmet
ThingDef.description: It is a state-of-the-art kwazaari helmet, optimized for EVA and orbital drop operations. This helmet has lots of shiny gadgets. Of course, all of these flashing toys are useless in the surface environment except the targeting assist pseudo A.I.

ThingDef.label: kwazaari strike suit
ThingDef.description: Yeonhwa Precision Strike Suit model 383a, 'ChangWol(Azure Moon) III'. Designed for urban strike teams, this sophisticated suit have short-ranged, fast jump thrusters for rapid assault. In order to maximize the operational capacity of this suit, the wearer requires fast reaction speed and exceptional boldness.

ThingDef.label: kwazaari strikesuit helmet
ThingDef.description: A kwazaari helmet of the delicate kwazaari strike suit. Sophisticated nerve assist system inside this helmet makes the wearer act faster.

ThingDef.label: kwazaari assault armor
ThingDef.description: An Ultra-heavy kwazaari protective armor, "Bjorn III" cladded with layers of composite kwazaari alloy-weave and reactive armor plates. The wearer of this armor is practically become a walking tank. This armor achieved tremendous protection at the expense of moving speed. It has an integrated short-range EMP grenade launcher.

ThingDef.label: kwazaari assault helmet
ThingDef.description: Rugged and trustworthy kwazaari helmet of the kwazaari assault armor.

ThingDef.label: kwazaari fire support armor
ThingDef.description: If you need a walking turret, call the "Varg III" kwazaari fire support armor. Rapid reloading system, additional ammo container, built in fire control system, everything of the "Varg III" focused on fire support. In return, the Varg is very vulnerable to close combat.

ThingDef.label: kwazaari fire support helmet
ThingDef.description: Quasar helmet of the kwazaari "Varg III" fire support armor. Share the features with the fire support armor.

ThingDef.label: kwazaari artillery armor
ThingDef.description: A kwazaari variant of the "Varg III" kwazaari fire support armor, the "Korp(Raven) III" artillery armor originated from modified makeshift equipment of frontlines. All unnecessary equipment was removed from Korp to mount a huge mortar, "Crow feeder." The purpose of this equipment is simple; turn the wearer into walking artillery. The only ammunition this mortar can shoot is high-explosive shells.

ThingDef.label: kwazaari reflactor carapace
ThingDef.description: The "Nemesis III" is a powered armor that created to hunt the Federation remnants. Almost immune to the heat energy, the Tisiphone Hunter Contingent provides this armor to their elite hunters.

ThingDef.label: kwazaari reflactor helmet
ThingDef.description: A kwazaari helmet with a complete set of heat deflector system.

ThingDef.label: kwazaari hazard carapace
ThingDef.description: The "Alecto III" kwazaari hazard carapace is designed to carry out mission even in the worst environment. In extreme cold area, in a heat wave, and even in radioactive wasteland, Tisiphone hunters can continue their endless hunting.

ThingDef.label: kwazaari hazard helmet
ThingDef.description: A kwazaari helmet of an "Alecto III" hazard carapace. This helmet provides excellent environmental protection.

ThingDef.label: kwazaari close combat armor
ThingDef.description: Quasar power armor with a built-in shield, "Excelsior III" is a close combat focused power armor with maneuverability, durability, and lethality.

ThingDef.label: kwazaari close combat helmet
ThingDef.description: Quasar elmet of a "Excelsior III" close combat armor. It assist wearer with neural close combat enhancement system.
